# addRecurrenceRule(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a recurrence rule to the recurrence rule array.

## Declaration

```swift
func addRecurrenceRule(_ rule: EKRecurrenceRule)
```

## Parameters

- **rule**: The rule to be added to [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKCalendarItem/recurrenceRules].

## Discussion

The implementation only supports a single recurrence rule. Adding a recurrence rule replaces the single recurrence rule.

## Setting Recurrence Rules

- **hasRecurrenceRules**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has recurrence rules.
- **removeRecurrenceRule(_:)**: Removes a recurrence rule from the recurrence rule array.
- **recurrenceRules**: The recurrence rules for the calendar item.
